text: "Rockin' in the Free World" is a 1989 song by Canadian singer Neil Young. It is from his 17th studio album Freedom. It went to number 39 in Canada and number 83 in the United Kingdom. It has been recorded by many artists including Bon Jovi and Pearl Jam. ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Heartland rock songs Category:Neil Young songs Category:Bon Jovi songs Category:Pearl Jam songs
title: Rockin' in the Free World
